questions.question: What is a 'Lender'?
options: The person who receives the money
The bank or institution that gives the money
The interest rate of the loan
questions.explanation: El 'lender' es el prestamista (quien da el dinero).

questions.question: Which sentence uses a superlative correctly?
options: This is the more expensive loan.
This is the most expensive loan.
This is the most cheap loan.
questions.explanation: Para adjetivos largos como 'expensive', usamos 'the most'.

questions.question: What does 'Term' mean in a loan context?
options: The amount of the monthly cuota
The period of time to repay the loan
questions.explanation: El 'term' es el plazo o tiempo total para devolver el préstamo.

questions.question: What is the superlative of 'Bad'?
questions.explanation: Bad es irregular y su superlativo es 'the worst'.

questions.question: If you pay a part of the loan every month, that payment is an:
questions.explanation: Cada pago mensual de un préstamo es un 'installment' (cuota).
